abstract: A “Saturday Night Live” sketch was repurposed as a 60-second commercial for Pepsi during the Super Bowl.
snippet: A “Saturday Night Live” sketch was repurposed as a 60-second commercial for Pepsi during the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: This Pepsi commercial, says Stuart Elliott of The New York Times, “may turn out to be one of the most audacious plays in the history of product placement, branded entertainment and blurring the line between entertainment and advertising.”

headline.main: A Skit on Saturday, an Advertisement on Sunday
